amendment.description: To provide for hiring additional conciliators for the regional offices of the Community Relations Service of the Department of Justice, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3222 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3222 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu. (consideration: CR S12722; text: CR S12722) To provide for hiring additional conciliators for the regional offices of the Community Relations Service of the Department of Justice, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3222 proposed by Senator Mikulski for Senator Landrieu.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3222 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
